libgenr 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Get books information by IDs.

libgen_ID_retrieve.Rd

This function gets books information by IDs with user specified or default fields.

libgen_ID_retrieve(IDs, fields = c(), full_fields = FALSE)

Arguments

IDs

One book ID or a vector of book IDs.
fields

Optional, user specified vector of fields to return. Below is available fields (case sensitive): ID, Title, VolumeInfo, Series, Periodical, Author,Year, Edition, Publisher, City, Pages, Language, Topic,Library, Issue, Identifier, ISSN, ASIN, UDC, LBC, DDC, LCC, Doi, Googlebookid, OpenLibraryID, Commentary, DPI, Color, Cleaned, Orientation, Paginated, Scanned, Bookmarked, Searchable,Filesize, Extension, MD5, CRC32, eDonkey, AICH, SHA1, TTH, Generic, Visible, Locator, Local, TimeAdded, TimeLastModified, Coverurl, identifierwodash, tags, pagesinfile, descr, toc, tth, sha1, aich, btih, torrent, crc32
full_fields

Whether returns with full fields (TRUE) or selected fields (FALSE).

Value

A data frame with results or FALSE if error occurs.

Examples

libgen_ID_retrieve(c(1,2,3))
#>   id                                  title volumeinfo
#> 1  1         Handbook of Clinical Drug Data           
#> 2  2           Handbook of Herbs and Spices   Volume 1
#> 3  3 Handbook of Herbs and Spices: Volume 2   Volume 2
#>                         series periodical          author year        edition
#> 1                                         Philip Anderson 2001             10
#> 2                                               K V Peter 2001              1
#> 3 Handbook of Herbs and Spices                Peter, K.V. 2004 2, illustrated
#>             publisher pages language topic library issue
#> 1 McGraw-Hill Medical  1163  English    12  Kolxo3    17
#> 2           CRC Press   332  English     0  Kolxoz    17
#> 3       Woodhead Pub.   360  English    49  Kolxo3    17
#>                  identifier issn filesize extension
#> 1             0-07-136362-9       3627486       pdf
#> 2  9780849312175,0849312175       1552793       pdf
#> 3 1855737213, 9781855737211       2298559       pdf
#>                                md5    crc32
#> 1 7b2a4d53fde834e801c26a2bab7e0240     <NA>
#> 2 048EA0496DB0444F873139CD705A07AF 9A5B09AD
#> 3 411B9300A2F2094800E0E30D439C30FD B0248B73
#>                                                                              locator
#> 1                 B_Biology/Handbook of Clinical Drug Data (10th Edition)(1163s).pdf
#> 2 B_Biology/Handbook of Herbs and Spices, Volume 1 (2001)(ISBN 0849312175)(332s).pdf
#> 3 B_Biology/Handbook of Herbs and Spices, Volume 2 (2001)(ISBN 0849325358)(374s).pdf
#>             timeadded    timelastmodified
#> 1 2009-07-20 03:45:11 2019-08-08 04:30:32
#> 2 2009-07-20 03:45:11 2017-12-31 19:26:31
#> 3 2009-07-20 03:45:11 2017-08-09 08:41:09
#>                                                                                                                                                                    torrent
#> 1                                                                                                                                                                     <NA>
#> 2 ZDQ6aW5mb2Q2Omxlbmd0aGkxNTUyNzkzZTQ6bmFtZTMyOjA0OGVhMDQ5NmRiMDQ0NGY4NzMxMzljZDcwNWEwN2FmMTI6cGllY2UgbGVuZ3RoaTE2Nzc3MjE2ZTY6cGllY2VzMjA6NNs6QJolda58oldr+ZE4+vcNt9llZQ==
#> 3 ZDQ6aW5mb2Q2Omxlbmd0aGkyMjk4NTU5ZTQ6bmFtZTMyOjQxMWI5MzAwYTJmMjA5NDgwMGUwZTMwZDQzOWMzMGZkMTI6cGllY2UgbGVuZ3RoaTE2Nzc3MjE2ZTY6cGllY2VzMjA6dt9VPLXrvhbEgTmc9/CarronQvplZQ==
libgen_ID_retrieve(c(1,2,3),full_fields=FALSE)
#>   id                                  title volumeinfo
#> 1  1         Handbook of Clinical Drug Data           
#> 2  2           Handbook of Herbs and Spices   Volume 1
#> 3  3 Handbook of Herbs and Spices: Volume 2   Volume 2
#>                         series periodical          author year        edition
#> 1                                         Philip Anderson 2001             10
#> 2                                               K V Peter 2001              1
#> 3 Handbook of Herbs and Spices                Peter, K.V. 2004 2, illustrated
#>             publisher pages language topic library issue
#> 1 McGraw-Hill Medical  1163  English    12  Kolxo3    17
#> 2           CRC Press   332  English     0  Kolxoz    17
#> 3       Woodhead Pub.   360  English    49  Kolxo3    17
#>                  identifier issn filesize extension
#> 1             0-07-136362-9       3627486       pdf
#> 2  9780849312175,0849312175       1552793       pdf
#> 3 1855737213, 9781855737211       2298559       pdf
#>                                md5    crc32
#> 1 7b2a4d53fde834e801c26a2bab7e0240     <NA>
#> 2 048EA0496DB0444F873139CD705A07AF 9A5B09AD
#> 3 411B9300A2F2094800E0E30D439C30FD B0248B73
#>                                                                              locator
#> 1                 B_Biology/Handbook of Clinical Drug Data (10th Edition)(1163s).pdf
#> 2 B_Biology/Handbook of Herbs and Spices, Volume 1 (2001)(ISBN 0849312175)(332s).pdf
#> 3 B_Biology/Handbook of Herbs and Spices, Volume 2 (2001)(ISBN 0849325358)(374s).pdf
#>             timeadded    timelastmodified
#> 1 2009-07-20 03:45:11 2019-08-08 04:30:32
#> 2 2009-07-20 03:45:11 2017-12-31 19:26:31
#> 3 2009-07-20 03:45:11 2017-08-09 08:41:09
#>                                                                                                                                                                    torrent
#> 1                                                                                                                                                                     <NA>
#> 2 ZDQ6aW5mb2Q2Omxlbmd0aGkxNTUyNzkzZTQ6bmFtZTMyOjA0OGVhMDQ5NmRiMDQ0NGY4NzMxMzljZDcwNWEwN2FmMTI6cGllY2UgbGVuZ3RoaTE2Nzc3MjE2ZTY6cGllY2VzMjA6NNs6QJolda58oldr+ZE4+vcNt9llZQ==
#> 3 ZDQ6aW5mb2Q2Omxlbmd0aGkyMjk4NTU5ZTQ6bmFtZTMyOjQxMWI5MzAwYTJmMjA5NDgwMGUwZTMwZDQzOWMzMGZkMTI6cGllY2UgbGVuZ3RoaTE2Nzc3MjE2ZTY6cGllY2VzMjA6dt9VPLXrvhbEgTmc9/CarronQvplZQ==
libgen_ID_retrieve(c(1,2,3),fields=c('ID','Title','Author'))
#>   id                                  title          author
#> 1  1         Handbook of Clinical Drug Data Philip Anderson
#> 2  2           Handbook of Herbs and Spices       K V Peter
#> 3  3 Handbook of Herbs and Spices: Volume 2     Peter, K.V.
